maqras.text: 53|26|ara asamanasamuhe bahu phirisata rayeche; tadera suparisa kichumatra phalaprasu habe na, tabe allahara anumatira para, yara jan'ya tini icche karena o yara prati tini santusta.
53|27|Niscaya yara akhiratera upara imana ane na tara'i naribacaka nama diye thake phirisataderake [1]
53|28|athaca e bisaye tadera kono jnana'i ne'i, tara to sudhu anumanera'i anusarana kare; ara niscaya anumana satyera mokabilaya kona'i kaje ase na [1].
53|29|Ata'eba, apani take upeksa kare caluna ye amadera smarana [1] theke bimukha haya ebam kebala duniyara jibana'i kamana kare.
53|30|Eta'i tadera jnanera sesa sima. Niscaya apanara raba, tini'i bhala janena ke tamra patha theke bicyuta hayeche ebam tini'i bhala janena ke hedayatapraapta hayeche.

53|31|Ara asamanasamuhe ya kichu ache o yamine ya kichu ache ta allah‌ra'i. Yate tini tadera kajera pratiphala dite parena yara manda kaja kare ebam taderake tini uttama puraskara dite parena yara satkaja kare

53|32|yara birata thake gurutara papa o aslila kaja theke, chotakhata aparadha byatita [1]. Niscaya apanara rabera ksama aparisima; tini tomadera samparke samyaka abagata---yakhana tini tomaderake srsti karechilena mati hate ebam yakhana tomara matrgarbhe bhrunarupe chile. Ata'eba, tomara atmaprasansa karo na, tini'i samyaka janena tara samparke ye taka'oya abalambana kareche [2].
53|33|Apani ki dekhechena se byaktike ye mukha phiriye neya
53|34|ebam dana kare saman'ya'i, pare bandha kare deya [1]
53|35|tara kache ki gayebera jnana ache ye, se pratyaksa kare
53|36|naki take janano hayani ya ache musara sahiphaya
53|37|ebam ibarahimera sahiphaya [1], yini purna karechilena (tara angikara) [2]
53|38|ta e'i ye [1], kono bojha bahanakari an'yera bojha bahana karabe na
53|39|ara e'i ye, manusa ta'i paya ya se cesta kare [1]
53|40|ara e'i ye, tara pracestara phala sighra'i dekha yabe
53|41|tarapara take deya habe purna pratidana
53|42|ara e'i ye, sabara sesa gantabya to apanara rabera kache [1]
53|43|ara e'i ye, tini'i hasana ebam tini'i kamdana [1]
53|44|ara e'i ye, tini'i marena ebam tini'i bamcana
53|45|ara e'i ye, tini'i srsti karena yugala---purusa o nari
53|46|sukrabindu hate, yakhana ta sthalita haya
53|47|ara e'i ye, punarut'thana ghatanora dayitba tamra'i [1]
53|48|ara e'i ye, tini'i abhabamukta karena ebam sampada dana karena [1]
53|49|ara e'i ye, tini si’ra naksatrera raba [1].
53|50|Ara e'i ye, tini'i pracina ‘ada sampradayake dhbansa karechilena
53|51|Ebam samuda sampradayake'o [1]; atahpara ka'uke'o tini baki rakhenani
53|52|ara edera age nuhera sampradayake'o, niscaya tara chila atyanta yalima o carama abadhya.
53|53|Ara tini ultano abasabhumike niksepa karechilena [1].
53|54|Atahpara setake acchanna karala ya acchanna karara [1]
53|55|sutaram (he manusa!) Tumi tomara rabera kon‌ anugraha samparke sandeha posana karabe [1]
53|56|e nabi'o [1] atitera satarkakaridera mata'i eka satarkakari.
53|57|Kiyamata asanna [1]
53|58|allaha chara ke'u'i eta prakasa karate saksama naya.
53|59|Tomara ki e kathaya bismaya bodha karacha
53|60|ara hasi-thatta karacha! Ebam kamdacho na [1]
53|61|ara tomara udasina [1]
53|62|ata'eba allahake sajada kara ebam tamra ‘ibadata kara [1].
54|1|Kiyamata kachakachi hayeche [1], ara camda bidirna hayeche [2]
54|2|ara tara kono nidarsana dekhale mukha phiriye neya ebam bale, ‘eta to ciracarita jadu [1].’
54|3|Ara tara mithyaropa kare ebam nija kheyala –khusira anusarana kare, athaca pratiti bisaya'i sesa lakse paumchabe [1].
54|4|Ara tadera kache eseche sambadasamuha, yate ache kathora nisedhajna
54|5|eta paripurna hikamata, kintu bhitipradarsana tadera kono kaje lageni.
54|6|Ata'eba, apani tadera upeksa karuna. (Smarana karuna) yedina ah‌banakari ah‌bana karabe eka bhayabaha parinamera dike
54|7|apamane abanamita netre [1] sedina tara kabara hate bera habe, mane habe yena tara biksipta pangapala
54|8|tara ahbanakarira dike chute asabe bhita-bihbala haye [1]. Kaphirara balabe, ‘bara'i kathina e dina.’
